data.oai_dc:dc: This file contains data on the following plant traits measured on Rhododendron maximum seedlings in an 11-month plant-soil feedback experiment: leaf budbreak phenology, aboveground biomass, belowground biomass, total biomass, root-to-shoot ratio, and specific leaf area.
Forest disturbance|Foundation species loss|Fungal community|Global change|Plant-soil feedback|Plant–soil (below-ground) interactions
